data.author: Reboot's Ramblings

changelog.release_notes:
v4.1:
-Optimized for Pebble OS 4.0
-Added Pebble 2 compatibility
-Compiled with SDK 4.0.1

v3.39:
-Reworked the Pebble Classic app for SDK3.8.
-Updated some outdated icons with new ones.
-Opening the app list on the watch app now centres the list on the current selected media app.
-Added more padding on the elapsed time/remaining time indicators for Pebble Time Round on the Art Screen.
-Bug fixes.

v3.37:
-Reworked the Pebble Classic app for SDK3.8.
-Updated some outdated icons with new ones.
-Opening the app list on the watch app now centres the list on the current selected media app.
-Bug fixes.

- Requires update to Android Companion App version 2.6+
- Added support for Pebble Time Round
- Album Art transfer 5x faster than previous versions
- Added Voice Commands (Pebble Time/Time Round - English only). http://musicboss.ca/voice
- Above features require Pebble Firmware 3.6+

Version 3.29 (Major update):
-Changed the large album art load bar/rectangle to a more visually appealing and less intrusive loading bar.
-Track title is now bold for easier viewing
-Artist/Album and Current controlled app info is now available on the album art screen. 3x back button or flicking your wrist (as you do to activate the back light) will cycle it on the screen.
-Current volume is displayed on the screen when loading the watch app on the art screen and when adjusting volume. This has already saved my ears twice when volume was way too loud and I was able to adjust it before starting music from the watch.
-When opening the app list on the watch app, the current controlled app will be highlighted (Music Boss Android App v2.5.x required).

v3.28:
-Added a configuration option for the 2x Select Button. Accessible via the 2x Back Button menu in Music Boss.

v3.27
-Fixed the issue with the wrong icons appearing when the volume and skip buttons are reversed.

Version 3.26
-Fixed: Wrong icons displayed when "Reverse Volume and Skip" enabled
-UI Tweaks

Version 3.25
-Supports Pebble Time and Pebble Classic
-Lots of new features for both platforms
-Fixed the action bar color for black color theme.

v2.22
-Removed splash screen
-Added persistent storage: saves watch app state for next time it is loaded. Retains volume/skip configuration, song info, gesture control enabled/disabled state and more.
-Disabling gestures will unsubscribe from tap handler to save battery life.

data.description:
The complete media control solution for Pebble
-Adaptive automatic app color theming and album art display (Android 4.3+)
-Rate songs (thumbs up/down) for Google Play Music
-Media controls
-Media Info display for all apps
-Media Progress display
-Change and launch media apps
-Control Chromecast streaming/volume
-Customize to your taste Open a list of your media apps (on your pebble) and select/launch them with one press. Integrated with other Pebble Apps and has a Tasker Plugin for even more control. See the Google Play Store listing for more details.

latest_release.release_notes:
v4.1:
-Optimized for Pebble OS 4.0
